Chorus Mailing List Signup</h1>

If you are a new or a returning member please use this page to sign up for email updates throughout the year.</p>

These emails are the only way that our Chorus Manager is able to contact you outside of rehearsals, so please subscribe to get vital information such as rehearsal information, concert details, community events and socials.</p>

If you are unsure which section you belong to then please email our Chorus Manager at chorus@eums.org.uk</a>.</p>

Chorus: Email Signup</a>
Subscribe to the appropriate mailing list in the boxes below if you want to be kept updated with the latest Chorus information and news:

These emails are sent in HTML format, and can be opened by most email clients. If you are not receiving emails, are having problems viewing an email or would like to unsubscribe from these mailing lists then please contact our Chorus Manager as detailed above.</small></p>

The Edinburgh University Music Society takes reasonable steps to ensure that data transmitted electronically to the Edinburgh University Music Society via the site or otherwise and stored by the Edinburgh University Music Society is not accessed by unauthorised third parties in accordance with the requirements of the Data Protection Act 1998.</small></p>
